description: jQuery plugin source code for handling form element values, including get/set methods for input, select, radio, and checkbox elements.

methods.name: val
methods.description: Getter/setter for form element values, handling different input types and options.

methods.name: valHooks.option.get
methods.description: Retrieves the value of an option element, falling back to text if value attribute is missing.

methods.name: valHooks.select.get
methods.description: Retrieves selected value(s) from a select element, supporting single and multiple select.

methods.name: valHooks.select.set
methods.description: Sets selected options in a select element based on provided value(s).

methods.name: valHooks.radio.set
methods.description: Sets the checked state of radio buttons based on an array of values.

methods.name: valHooks.checkbox.set
methods.description: Sets the checked state of checkboxes based on an array of values.
